This directory contains source code and libraries from third parties.  Mainly Microsoft.

* ddraw.lib and ddraw.h are from the DirectX 5 SDK.  DirectDraw has been deprecated from the later versions of the SDK.
* ddutil.cpp is from the samples folder of the DirectX 5 SDK.
* Map-N-Zap needs richtx32.ocx to be registered on the computer to run correctly.  Microsoft has not included this OCX control in recent versions of Windows.  I found this copy on IBM's website: http://www-01.ibm.com/support/docview.wss?uid=swg21171121.
